channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #澳大利亚官员称，澳大利亚向来访的中国外长表示，香港改革 "侵蚀了权利
item.description:

item.title: 没有人出价。缅甸民主领袖昂山素季被软禁多年的湖畔豪宅周三进行拍卖，最低价为 1.5 亿美元，但没有人出价。
item.description:
No bids.

The lakeside mansion where Myanmar's democracy leader Aung San Suu Kyi spent years under house arrest went under auction on Wednesday with a minimum price of $150 million -- but attracted no bidshttps://t.co/DI0dbbfUKf pic.twitter.com/zrS1MlHWHF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频： 人工智能巨头英伟达（Nvidia）发布更高性能的 "超级芯片"。英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）发布了该公司用于人工智能的最新芯片。"我们需要更大的 GPU。因此，女士们、先生们，我要向你们介绍一个非常非常大的 GPU。
item.description:
VIDEO: AI giant Nvidia unveils higher performing 'superchips'.

Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang unveils the firm's latest chips for powering artificial intelligence. "We need bigger GPUs. So ladies and gentlemen, I would like to introduce you to a very, very big GPU," says Huang at a… pic.twitter.com/oPAe5unrVP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: "上校的诅咒 "被日本棒球迷视为幸运符的肯德基桑德斯上校雕像终于被 "处理 "掉了。这座雕像于 1985 年被扔进大阪的一条河里，2009 年在当地一支球队的成绩下滑后被打捞上来。
item.description:
"Curse of the Colonel"

A statue of KFC's Colonel Sanders, considered a lucky charm by Japanese baseball fans, has finally been "disposed of".

The statue was thrown into a river in Osaka in 1985, then recovered in 2009 after a local team's fortunes flagged… pic.twitter.com/jzEOI094My

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 日本警告球迷不要试图前往 "敌对的 "朝鲜观看下周在平壤举行的世界杯预选赛
item.description:
Japan has warned football fans not to attempt to travel to "hostile" North Korea for next week's World Cup qualifier in Pyongyanghttps://t.co/gFNwXsp0tj pic.twitter.com/VBJOG4tjEY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚接待中国FMC中国和澳大利亚周三在堪培拉举行会谈，尽管在高调囚犯、贸易以及中国政府在香港和其他地方的镇压行动等问题上仍存在明显紧张关系，但两国声称已经稳定了长期受限的关系。
item.description:
Australia hosts China FM

China and Australia claim to have stabilised long-strained relations after talks in Canberra on Wednesday, despite tensions over a high-profile prisoner, trade and Beijing's crackdowns in Hong Kong and elsewhere remaining evidenthttps://t.co/7ljMXBSBs8 pic.twitter.com/RP7EM3gFxY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据朝鲜国家媒体报道，朝鲜领导人金正恩监督了 "新型中程高超音速导弹 "固体燃料发动机的成功试验
item.description:
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has overseen a successful test of a solid-fuel engine for a "new-type intermediate-range hypersonic missile", state media reportshttps://t.co/Hr1soMPyDW pic.twitter.com/mIwhdXUbpw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频： 阿尼，一座可以弥合土耳其和亚美尼亚痛苦分歧的古城。阿尼废城矗立在世界上最敏感的边界之一，这座摇摇欲坠的桥梁象征着土耳其和亚美尼亚之间的关系状况。这座破败的桥梁象征着土耳其和亚美尼亚之间的关系。
item.description:
VIDEO: Ani, an ancient city that could bridge Turkey and Armenia's bitter divide.

The ruined city of Ani stands on one of the world's most sensitive borders, a crumbling bridge symbolising the state of relations between Turkey and Armenia. Once the capital of a mediaeval… pic.twitter.com/UB9EOuCVNv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：印度庆祝传统舞蹈节 Theyyam......在印度南部小镇 Somwarpet，当地人庆祝被称为 "Thyyam "或 "Kaliyattam "的传统舞蹈节。这种仪式结合了戏剧、哑剧和崇拜，是南印度最古老、最具代表性的节日之一。
item.description:
VIDEO: India celebrates the traditional dance festival of Theyyam.

In the southern Indian town of Somwarpet, locals celebrate the traditional dance festival known as 'Theyyam' or 'Kaliyattam.' The ritual combining theatre, mime and worship is one of South India's oldest and… pic.twitter.com/AvJVpUhyTT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 芬兰连续第七年成为世界上最幸福的国家。由联合国赞助的《世界幸福报告》显示，丹麦、冰岛和瑞典也跻身于最幸福的十个国家之列，而阿富汗则在接受调查的 143 个国家中排名垫底。
item.description:
Finland is world's happiest country for seventh year.

The UN sponsored World Happiness Report shows also Denmark, Iceland and Sweden among the 10 most cheerful and Afghanistan at the bottom of the 143 countries surveyedhttps://t.co/koof6eICrU pic.twitter.com/q84hvWmF3z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: @AFP的Jose Jordan拍摄了西班牙巴伦西亚Fallas节最后一晚燃烧的 "Ninots"（纸板雕像）。Fallas是一个巨大的纸板结构，描绘了时事和名人，其中的单个人物或Ninots...
item.description:
Burning festival.@AFP's Jose Jordan photographs 'Ninots' (cardboard figurines) burning on the last night of the Fallas Festival in Valencia, Spain.

The fallas, gigantic cardboard structures that portray current events and celebrities in which individual figures or ninots are… pic.twitter.com/fHptue4srm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：鲨鱼是 "害羞的小狗"：头条新闻称美国东南部的佛罗里达州是世界上最有可能被鲨鱼咬伤的地方。他们说得没错，但与此同时，被鲨鱼咬伤的情况却极为罕见......
item.description:
VIDEO: Sharks are 'shy puppy dogs': With bites rare, experts want to shed scary reputation.

Headlines have dubbed the southeastern US state of Florida the world's most likely place to be bitten by a shark. They're right, but, at the same time, shark bites are exceedingly rare… pic.twitter.com/rqwI1mHMov

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）指责竞选对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）蔑视拉美裔，因为这位现任总统正试图在内华达州和亚利桑那州等战场州争取拉美裔这一关键人群的支持。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden accused election rival Donald Trump of despising Latinos as the incumbent tried to shore up support from a crucial demographic in the battleground states of Nevada and Arizona.https://t.co/AS3zVJvt4L pic.twitter.com/Ao5d4vlc9Z

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普说，他淡化对北约承诺的言论只是一种谈判策略，目的是让成员国为北约的集体防御支付更多费用
item.description:
Donald Trump said his remarks downplaying his commitment to NATO were merely a negotiating tactic to get member nations to pay more towards the alliance's collective defense https://t.co/O1ec0b6QNx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: DeepMind 联合创始人穆斯塔法-苏莱曼（Mustafa Suleyman）将成为微软新成立的消费人工智能部门的负责人，这位科学家兼企业家表示
item.description:
DeepMind co-founder Mustafa Suleyman will become the head of a newly created consumer AI unit at Microsoft, the scientist and entrepreneur said https://t.co/vLFfvwVzRA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：香港立法会议员一致通过新的国家安全法，规定对叛国罪和叛乱罪处以终身监禁，对窃取国家机密罪处以最高 20 年监禁。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hong Kong legislators unanimously passed a new national security law that introduces penalties such as life imprisonment for crimes related to treason and insurrection, and up to 20 years in jail for the theft of state secrets https://t.co/mBuRBTCgL1 pic.twitter.com/N75DDqwqDC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统在马赛和法国其他城市发起了打击贩毒的重大行动，称去年造成数十人死亡的黑帮争斗使居民的生活苦不堪言。
item.description:
President Emmanuel Macron launched a major operation against drug trafficking in Marseille and other French cities, saying that gangland battles that last year left dozens dead had made life a misery for residents https://t.co/T3dj1pgatm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 🇺🇸 此视频经过修改--原视频显示美国国会女议员马乔里-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）手持写有 "特朗普 "和 "让美国再次伟大 "的标语。
item.description:
🇺🇸 This video is altered -- the original shows US Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene holding a sign that says "Trump" and "Make America Great Again" https://t.co/pIYwMibEfL pic.twitter.com/8TelmtKD1P

— AFP Fact Check 🔎 (@AFPFactCheck) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国批准向巴林出售价值 22 亿美元的先进主战坦克，巴林曾因镇压什叶派异议人士而受到武器禁运。
item.description:
The United States approved a $2.2 billion sale of advanced battle tanks to Bahrain, a Gulf Arab ally once under an arms embargo over a crackdown on Shiite dissent https://t.co/LGAo3FXsVH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: ❌ 尽管 Instagram 上的一段热门视频声称，2023 年的一项研究并未发现 Covid-19 疫苗与甲状腺问题之间存在因果关系。
item.description:
❌ A 2023 study did not find a causal relationship between Covid-19 vaccines and thyroid problems, despite claims in a popular video on Instagram https://t.co/WCRmmA1ivO

— AFP Fact Check 🔎 (@AFPFactCheck) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国最高法院撤销了对德克萨斯州一项有争议的法律的搁置，该法律允许州警察逮捕从墨西哥非法进入美国的移民并将其驱逐出境
item.description:
The US Supreme Court lifted its hold on a controversial Texas law that would allow state police to arrest and deport migrants who cross illegally into the United States from Mexico https://t.co/rYVipelbPv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: #视频：冈比亚立法者周一投票决定将一项极具争议的法案推进到下一个议会阶段，该法案旨在取消对切割女性生殖器官（FGM）的禁令。
item.description:
#VIDEO Gambian lawmakers voted on Monday to advance to the next parliamentary stage a highly controversial bill that seeks to lift a ban on female genital mutilation (FGM) pic.twitter.com/r2bcNJc7zM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 根据一份调查报告，巴西警方建议对前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗涉嫌伪造其 Covid 疫苗接种证书提出指控
item.description:
Brazil's police have recommended that former president Jair Bolsonaro be charged for the alleged forging of his Covid vaccination certificate, according to an investigation report https://t.co/OEJTDAo0D8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 海地一名雇员说，海地安全部队击退了对中央银行的袭击，至少打死了三人，因为帮派暴力在首都太子港激增
item.description:
Security forces in Haiti killed at least three people, repelling an attack on the central bank as gang violence surges in the capital of Port-au-Prince, an employee said https://t.co/qivF3YCmNf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 西班牙选手乔恩-拉姆（Jon Rahm）计划在今年的美国名人赛冠军晚宴上提供巴斯克风格的盛宴，他的祖母和明星主厨何塞-安德烈斯（Jose Andres）都为他提供了炖扁豆的食谱。
item.description:
Spain's Jon Rahm plans on serving a Basque-style feast at this year's Masters Champions Dinner, with help from his grandmother's lentil stew recipe and star chef Jose Andres https://t.co/WEAGaSsavS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: #国际奥委会宣布：俄罗斯和白俄罗斯运动员将不参加奥运会开幕式

item.title: 罗马最美丽的广场之一摆满了上千口棺材，工会就工伤事故死亡人数发表了强有力的声明
item.description:
A thousand coffins filled one of Rome's most beautiful squares as a trade union made a powerful statement on the number of deaths in work-related accidents https://t.co/yGICRgUuel

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的前白宫贸易顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）周二前往佛罗里达州一所监狱报到，开始因藐视国会而服刑四个月。
item.description:
Peter Navarro, Donald Trump's former White House trade advisor, was reporting to a Florida prison on Tuesday to begin serving a four-month sentence for contempt of Congress https://t.co/7KblXoedfy pic.twitter.com/AAfKqfAfh2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇰🇷 在美国出生的埃里克-南（Eric Nam）到韩国发展音乐事业时几乎不会说韩语，但他却成为了韩国最大的 K-Pop 明星之一。📱 @maelyssourt📷 @JoelSaget#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇰🇷 US-born Eric Nam barely spoke any Korean when he moved to South Korea to build a music career, but he's become one of the country's biggest K-Pop stars.

📱 @maelyssourt
📷 @JoelSaget#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/b3W48y4sHL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024
